title: NFL Week 16 Picks Against the Spread, Best Bets, Gambling Advice (Football 12/25)
description:
Will Brinson, R.J. White and Kenny White link up to offer their Best Bets for Week 16 of the NFL season.
Saturday games (2:45)
Bucs-Lions
49ers-Cardinals
Dolphins-Raiders
Sunday games (12:30)
Colts-Steelers
Rams-Seahawks
Browns-Jets
Broncos-Chargers
Bengals-Texans
Titans-Packers
Bills-Patriots
Eagles-Cowboys
Giants-Ravens
Falcons-Chiefs
Bears-Jaguars
Panthers-Washington
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @PriscoCBS, @rjwhite1, @KWhiteyVegas
